events.name: ProductOrdered
events.description: Initiates the order process for products purchased by a customer.

events.name: OrderConfirmed
events.description: Indicates that an order has been confirmed by the system.

events.name: OrderShipped
events.description: Triggers when the order is dispatched to the customer.

events.name: OrderCancelled
events.description: Allows customers to cancel their orders before shipment.

events.name: ProductReturned
events.description: Handles returning a product after it has been delivered.

commands.name: PlaceOrder
commands.description: Initiates the order process for products purchased by a customer.

commands.name: ConfirmOrder
commands.description: Indicates that an order has been confirmed by the system.

commands.name: ShipOrder
commands.description: Triggers when the order is dispatched to the customer.

commands.name: CancelOrder
commands.description: Allows customers to cancel their orders before shipment.

commands.name: ReturnProduct
commands.description: Handles returning a product after it has been delivered.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration point to manage product quantity based on orders.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerRelationshipManagement
integrationPoints.description: Sync customer order details with the CRM system.

integrationPoints.name: ShippingServices
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with external shipping services for order dispatching.

integrationPoints.name: PaymentGateway
integrationPoints.description: Integration for processing payments related to orders.
